long_description: The Deuter Aircontact Pro 70 + 15 Pack comfortably hauls heavy loads on long treks with a host of smart details and a clean, fresh design. Vari Fit system with stepless adjustment for the perfect fit on virtually any back length; pull-forward hipbelt adjustment. Quick access through the front zip opening. Detachable lid compartment with zipped pocket and 2 valuables pockets quickly transforms into a daypack thanks to the attachment ring and additional straps. Head molding and side compression straps position the lid for more head clearance. Side bellows pockets hold excess baggage or can be used to accommodate a Streamer hydration reservoir (not included). The Deuter Aircontact Pro 70 + 15 Pack features robust outer material to helps ensure longevity on extended backpacking trips.
short_description: The Deuter Aircontact Pro 70 + 15 Pack comfortably hauls heavy loads on long treks with a host of smart details and a clean, fresh design.
